channel.title: ::Commands [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
What's the snippet for ::commands where an interface comes up listing what commands players are able to use?
Thanks,
Resent

item.title: ::Commands [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @StubernSnake StubernSnake
item.description:
@StubernSnake wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")) { //change name to whatever, info, donate etc. c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your Title Here -- added by Pistol Pete ", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("1", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("2", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("3", 8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("4", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("5", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("6", 8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("7", 8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("8", 8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126("9", 8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126("10", 8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("11", 8157); c.getPA().sendFrame126("12", 8158); c.getPA().sendFrame126("13", 8159); // replace the numbers with your text, between the "" }

Read full topic

item.title: ::Commands [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:4, topic:431433”][quote author=Michaeliii link=topic=534111.msg3904871#msg3904871 date=1328138880]

What’s the snippet for ::commands where an interface comes up listing what commands players are able to use?

Thanks,

Resent

do you need it for PI or Delta?

Obviously PI, read title.
[/quote]
ah, sorry bro, let me get you one.

EDIT:
Im not sure if this is EXACTLY what you need, but try it out

and sorry if it sucks, i just wrote it

put this in the commands.java

[code]

else if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”)) {
c.sendMessage(" Your current commands;");
c.sendMessage(" -------------");
c.sendMessage("------------- “);
c.sendMessage(”------------- “);
c.sendMessage(”------------- “);
c.sendMessage(”------------- “);
c.sendMessage(”------------- ");
}[/code][/quote]

Try using this instead:

                        if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")) {
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-Commands",8144);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8145);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8146);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8147);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8148);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8149);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@-Command here",8150);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-Have fun!",8151);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-The YourServerNameHere Team",8152);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("",8153);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("",8154);
                                getPA().sendFrame126("",8155);
                                getPA().showInterface(8134);
                                        flushOutStream();
                        }

Be sure to change YourServerName to your servers name.

Read full topic
